body:
you may find this interesting, perhaps just a starting point...


http://web.mac.com/geotrupes/iWeb/Main%20site/RadBlog/F684499E-33AE-4E8C
-959A-85AF81FDBCB5.html






when you say 'complex light sources'... 


do you mean that you are modelling the lamp + reflector? Radiance may
struggle a little to evaluate the full thing... you may want to pre
process your sources with trace pro or something similar and use the
ies...


(you may do this in radiance as well but it's trickier)


G.
